attributes.action: instigate legislation that will ensure that M.P's have to be full time M.P's and not have other employment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many M.P's do not give their full attention to doing the job that they were elected to do but spend much of the working day in very lucrative private practices as,for example, lawyers.
If the are elected to be a Member of Parliament, and receive a very substantial salary and expenses, they should commit to do only that job.
